description.message: Stop procrastinating! I will remind you about postponed bookmarks.

popup_suggests.message: The magic shuffle suggests you to open

step2_description.message: You have to select folders where I should take bookmarks from

step2_it_will.message: It will create a new folder where I will store new bookmarks

step2_nofolders.message: Choose at least 1 folder to continue

achievements_grats.message: Congratulations! You've just unlocked an achievement! Keep the good work!

achievements_addedLots_unlocked.message: You've added more than 40 bookmarks to shuffle!

achievements_addedLots_locked.message: Locked: add 40+ bookmarks to shuffle to unlock

achievements_social_unlocked.message: You've shared Procrastilater in more than 1 social networks!

achievements_social_locked.message: Locked: share Procrastilater in 2+ social networks to unlock

achievements_reviewer_unlocked.message: You've sent a message to developer!

achievements_reviewer_locked.message: Locked: share your ideas/review/thoughts to developer to unlock

achievements_visitor_unlocked.message: Good job! You've visited more than 20 postponed bookmarks already!

achievements_visitor_locked.message: Locked: visit 20+ bookmarks at all time to unlock

achievements_postponer_unlocked.message: Ahh, come on! You've postponed more than 10 bookmarks already

achievements_manualOpener_unlocked.message: Wow, what a dedication! You've opened more than 15 bookmarks manually!

achievements_manualOpener_locked.message: Locked: open 15+ bookmarks manually to unlock

conversation_description.message: We would like to know how can we improve your experience. Feel free to send us your thoughts!

conversation_uhm_whacha_say.message: What do you think, what do you suggest?

folders_0_bookmarks.message: You have 0 bookmarks in selected folders

folders_where_from.message: Change folders where I will take bookmarks from

folders_at_least_one.message: You must have at least 1 folder with bookmarks selected

main_if_u_like.message: If you like Procrastilater - share it with friends!

main_you_will_get.message: You will get an achievement if you'll share it at least in 2 social networks!

progress_done.message: Well done! You've visited all postponed bookmarks!

progress_no_bookmarks.message: You have no bookmarks in selected folders yet

stats_such_tempo.message: If you continue with such tempo - you will deal with all bookmarks in

timer_disabled.message: timer is disabled if you've chosen a manual reminder appearance

browserAction_done.message: You have no new bookmarks in selected folders.

browserAction_select_other.message: Select other folders or add new bookmarks to continue

background_because.message: because it's currently in our folders pool

background_page_already_in.message: Can't add this page to bookmarks, because it already exists in folder:

background_cant_open_popup.message: Can't open popup with bookmark right now. It will be opened when you will visit any website.
